official-title.#text: To prohibit certain nutrition rules with respect to foods sold at schools as a fundraiser.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Education and the Workforce

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Bringing Awareness and Knowledge to Exempt Schools Against Legislative Encroachment Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Bringing Awareness and Knowledge to Exempt Schools Against Legislative Encroachment Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall not implement, administer, or enforce the rule entitled

in the Federal Register on June 28, 2013 (78 Fed. Reg.
			 39068 et seq.) with respect to food sold as a fundraiser that takes place
			 on the grounds of a school.

quote.#text:
National School Lunch Program and School Breakfast Program: Nutrition Standards for All Foods Sold
			 in School as Required by the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 5417 IH: Bringing Awareness and Knowledge to Exempt Schools Against Legislative Encroachment Act
